contentrichtext.text: '''Dalton''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} == Places == ;Canada * [[Dalton, Algoma District, Ontario]] * [[Dalton Armoury]], a Canadian Forces facility primarily used by the Queen's Own Rifles of Canada ;England * [[Dalton, Cumbria]] * [[Dalton, Lancashire]] * [[Dalton, Hexham, Northumberland]] * [[Dalton, Ponteland, Northumberland]] * [[Dalton, Hambleton]], North Yorkshire * [[Dalton, Richmondshire]], North Yorkshire * [[Dalton, South Yorkshire]] * [[Dalton, West Yorkshire]] * [[Dalton-in-Furness]], Cumbria * [[Dalton-on-Tees]], North Yorkshire ;Israel * [[Dalton, Israel]] ;Scotland * [[Dalton, Dumfries and Galloway]] * [[Dalton, South Lanarkshire]] ;South Africa * [[Dalton, KwaZulu-Natal]], South Africa ;United States * [[Dalton, California]] * [[Dalton, Georgia]] * [[Dalton Gardens, Idaho]] * [[Dalton City, Illinois]] * [[Dalton, Massachusetts]] * [[Dalton, Minnesota]] * [[Dalton, Missouri]] * [[Dalton, Nebraska]] * [[Dalton, New Hampshire]] * [[Dalton, New York]] * [[Dalton, Ohio]] * [[Dalton, Pennsylvania]] * The [[Dalton Trail]], an old Tlingit trail {{See also|Dalton Township (disambiguation)}} == People == * [[Dalton (surname)]] * [[Dalton (given name)]] ;Collective name * The [[Dalton Gang]], brotherhood of outlaws in the American Old West * [[Jesse and Festus]], once known as The Daltons, a professional wrestling tag team made up of Jesse Dalton and Festus Dalton == Film and television == * ''Dalton'', working title for ''[[Code of Vengeance]]'' television series * [[Dalton (Buffyverse)]], minor character from ''Buffy the Vampire Slayer'' television series * [[Dalton (Chrono Trigger)]], non-playable main character in ''Chrono Trigger'' * [[Dalton Russell]], character played by Clive Owen in 2006 film ''Inside Man'' * Dalton Academy, a fictional school in the hit TV series ''[[Glee (TV Series)|Glee]]' * [[The Daltons (Lucky Luke)]], fictional outlaws in the ''Lucky Luke'' comic book series ==Music== * [[Dalton (band)]], Danish musical band **''Dalton'', 1992 self-titled album by Danish band Dalton above * [[The Dalton Brothers (band)|The Dalton Brothers]], a spoof country band created and portrayed by U2 that served as its opening act for several concerts in 1987 == Science == * [[Dalton (unit)]] (Da), the atomic mass unit, named after the chemist John Dalton * [[Dalton's law]], a thermodynamic law about partial pressures * [[Dalton (crater)]], a lunar crater * [[Dalton (program)]], a quantum chemistry software * ''[[Dalton Transactions]]'', a scientific journal covering inorganic chemistry == Other == * [[Dalton Airport (Michigan)]] in Flushing, Michigan, United States * [[Dalton Barracks]], current name of former Royal Air Force station near Abingdon, Oxfordshire * [[Dalton Castle]], 14th-century peel tower situated in Dalton-in-Furness, Cumbria, England * [[Dalton Municipal Airport]] in Dalton, Georgia, United States * [[Dalton State College]], one of eight state colleges in the University System of Georgia * ''[[Daltons Weekly]]'', a weekly newspaper * [[Dalton Plan]], an educational concept created by Helen Parkhurst ** [[Dalton School]], a private school in New York City founded by Helen Parkhurst based on the Dalton Plan * [[Dalton Tradition]], a distinctive shape of stone arrowhead * [[Dalton Winery]], a winery in Israel == See also == * [[D'Alton]] * {{lookfrom|Dalton}} * {{intitle|Dalton}} * ''[[Dalton v. Specter]]'', a case heard before the United States Supreme Court in 1994 * [[Daltoni]], a former Yugoslav rock band {{disambiguation|geo}} [[Category:English toponyms]] [[Category:Hebrew toponyms]]
